title: r/Maliciouscompliance My Boss Wants to Race Me... But I'm Pro Racer
description:
r/Maliciouscompliance In today's episode, OP has a boss who's OBSESSED with racing. The boss forces all of his employees to attend a go kart racing company event so that he can beat all of his employees in the race and feel good about himself. The boss forces OP to go... but the boss isn't aware that OP is a competitive go kart racer. OP absolutely destroys his boss in the race, embarrassing him in front of the whole company!

Download the GetUpside app and use Code "Slash" to get up to 50¢ off per gallon on your next tank of gas.
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
